# vue-print-plugin

Prints plugins for specific blocks

## EXAMPLE

[Demo](https://burning1993.github.io/vue-print-plugin)

## Install

```sh
npm install vue-print-plugin -S
```

## Quick Start

```js
// main.js
import Vue from 'vue'
import Print from 'vue-print-plugin'

Vue.use(Print)
// App.vue
this.$print(this.$refs[ref])
```
